queries.query_name: S3 Bucket ACL Allows Read Or Write to All Users
queries.description: S3 Buckets should not be readable and writable to all users

files.expected_value: 'acl' should equal to 'private'
'acl' should equal to 'private'

queries.description: Privileged containers lack essential security restrictions and should be avoided by removing the 'privileged' flag or by changing its value to false

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{vulnerable-pod}}.spec.containers.name={{vulnerable-container}}.securityContext.privileged is unset or false

queries.query_name: Default Azure Storage Account Network Access Is Too Permissive
queries.description: Make sure that your Azure Storage Account access is limited to those who require it.

files.expected_value: resource with type 'Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts' publicNetworkAccess should be set to false, and/or networkAcls.defaultAction should be set to deny
files.actual_value: resource with type 'Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts' networkAcls.defaultAction is set to 'Allow')

queries.description: IAM policy should not grant full permissions to resources from the get-go, instead of granting permissions gradually as necessary.

files.expected_value: 'policy.Statement.Resource' and 'policy.Statement.Action' should not equal '*'

queries.description: Key Vault should have 'enableSoftDelete' and 'enablePurgeProtection' set to true

files.expected_value: resource with type 'Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults' should have 'enableSoftDelete' property defined
files.actual_value: resource with type 'Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults' doesn't have 'enableSoftDelete' property defined

files.expected_value: resource with type 'Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults' should have 'enablePurgeProtection' property defined
files.actual_value: resource with type 'Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults' doesn't have 'enablePurgeProtection' property defined

spec.containers.name=host-network-container has resources defined
spec.containers.name=hostpath-container has resources defined
spec.containers.name=vulnerable-container has resources defined

queries.description: CPU requests should be set to ensure the sum of the resource requests of the scheduled Containers is less than the capacity of the node

files.expected_value: spec.containers.name=vulnerable-container should have resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=vulnerable-container should have resources defined
spec.containers.name=hostpath-container should have resources defined
spec.containers.name=host-network-container should have resources defined

queries.description: Check if Deployment resources don't have a podAntiAffinity policy, which prevents multiple pods from being scheduled on the same node.

files.expected_value: 'spec.template.spec.affinity' should be set

queries.description: Deployments should be assigned with a PodDisruptionBudget to ensure high availability

files.expected_value: metadata.name=vulnerable-deployment is targeted by a PodDisruptionBudget
files.actual_value: metadata.name=vulnerable-deployment is not targeted by a PodDisruptionBudget

queries.description: IAM Access Analyzer should be enabled and configured to continuously monitor resource permissions

files.expected_value: 'aws_accessanalyzer_analyzer' should be set
'aws_accessanalyzer_analyzer' should be set
'aws_accessanalyzer_analyzer' should be set
'aws_accessanalyzer_analyzer' should be set

queries.description: Images should be specified together with their digests to ensure integrity

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{host-network-pod}}.spec.containers.name={{host-network-container}}.image should specify the image with a digest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{host-network-pod}}.spec.containers.name={{host-network-container}}.image does not include an image digest

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{vulnerable-deployment}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vulnerable-container}}.image should specify the image with a digest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{vulnerable-deployment}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vulnerable-container}}.image does not include an image digest

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{vulnerable-pod}}.spec.containers.name={{vulnerable-container}}.image should specify the image with a digest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{vulnerable-pod}}.spec.containers.name={{vulnerable-container}}.image does not include an image digest

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{hostpath-pod}}.spec.containers.name={{hostpath-container}}.image should specify the image with a digest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{hostpath-pod}}.spec.containers.name={{hostpath-container}}.image does not include an image digest

queries.description: Image tag must be defined and not be empty or equal to latest.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{vulnerable-pod}}.spec.containers.name={{vulnerable-container}}.image tag is provided and not latest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{vulnerable-pod}}.spec.containers.name={{vulnerable-container}}.image tag is not provided or latest

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{host-network-pod}}.spec.containers.name={{host-network-container}}.image tag is provided and not latest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{host-network-pod}}.spec.containers.name={{host-network-container}}.image tag is not provided or latest

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{vulnerable-deployment}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vulnerable-container}}.image tag is provided and not latest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{vulnerable-deployment}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vulnerable-container}}.image tag is not provided or latest

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{hostpath-pod}}.spec.containers.name={{hostpath-container}}.image tag is provided and not latest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{hostpath-pod}}.spec.containers.name={{hostpath-container}}.image tag is not provided or latest

queries.description: Lambda permission may be misconfigured if the action field is not filled in by 'lambda:InvokeFunction'

files.expected_value: [excessive_role_policy].policy should be misconfigured
files.actual_value: [excessive_role_policy].policy allows access to function (unqualified ARN) and its sub-resources, add another statement with ":*" to function name

files.expected_value: [admin_policy].policy should be misconfigured
files.actual_value: [admin_policy].policy allows access to function (unqualified ARN) and its sub-resources, add another statement with ":*" to function name

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{host-network-pod}}.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{host-network-container}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{host-network-pod}}.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{host-network-container}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{hostpath-pod}}.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{hostpath-container}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{hostpath-pod}}.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{hostpath-container}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{vulnerable-deployment}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{vulnerable-container}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{vulnerable-deployment}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{vulnerable-container}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{vulnerable-pod}}.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{vulnerable-container}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{vulnerable-pod}}.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{vulnerable-container}}

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{hostpath-pod}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated
